full_text:
Explosive plays are often measured by their frequency(9% rate etc). This is valuable, but fails to capture their dynamic nature. A gain of 40 != 20. 

Using drives as our unit of analysis, we can see the teams that added the most expected points via explosive plays. 

#nflverse https://t.co/sDAbzsDOH8

Much of the data used in the blog, including in this piece, will rely on the @nflfastR model. I cannot speak highly enough of the project and the people involved in it -- most of what I've learned relating to football analysis has come from the #nflverse 

https://t.co/ouIslbbvVP

Now official.
Thanks for the great years Tom, 22 years breaking records (and my charts)!

Now (finally!) it's time for the others.

#TomBrady #RStats 

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/XsQ3ZLiOic
